review_data.title: Stylish, friendly and good!
review_data.content: Been there for a spontaneous dinner with friends. Variety of dishes is small, but everything is freshly prepared and good. The service personell is upmost friendly and professional. The modern and warm interior makes you feel cozy and at home. A small mistake by the...More

review_data.title: Super!
review_data.content: Schön gibt es nun das Sign in Wallisellen.Gutes Essen,coole Location und super nettes Personal.Wir kommen gerne wieder.

review_data.title: Great service and good food
review_data.content: I ate in this restaurant after flying in from London for the evening and staying in the hotel attached to the restaurant. The selection of snacks although limited did offer something for everyone and the local beer I had was excellent. Staff were very friendly...More

review_data.title: nachtessen mit freunden
